com.slightech.ble.mynt

接口 MyntListener.PairCallback

  • 封闭类:
    MyntListener

    public static interface MyntListener.PairCallback
    zh:

    设备连接配对回调

    在connect 连接设备后，需要正确连接设备，之后经过服务配对。 服务配对成功后，会开始小觅秘钥请求配对。在pairBindStart 配对绑定开始方法中 用户需要调用reqeustPassword方法进行请求小觅秘钥，如果已经保存过小觅秘钥需要 调用sendPassword 进行配对。

    en:

    Device connect the pairing callback

    After the connect connection device, the need to properly connect the small to find the device, after service matching. Service after the pairing is successful, will start to find the secret key pair request. In the pairBindStart pairing binding method The user request device key need to call the reqeustPassword method, if you have saved the secret key to device Call sendPassword to match.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void pairBindOver(java.lang.String sn, boolean passwordRight)
      zh: 配对绑定结束 秘钥配对结束，秘钥正确配对成功，秘钥错误则配对失败。
      void pairBindStart(java.lang.String sn)
      zh: 配对绑定开始 连接成功、服务检测成功后，进入配对秘钥开始，需要在次方法中调用reqeustPassword请求小觅秘钥。
      void pairConnectOver(java.lang.String sn, int errorCode, int status)
      zh: 配对连接结束 在连接过程出现异常或错误断开 en: End of pairing connection An exception or error occurs during the connection.
      void pairConnectStart(java.lang.String sn)
      zh: 配对连接开始 开始连接设备 en: Pairing connection Start connecting device
      void pairDisconnect(java.lang.String sn)
      zh: 配对连接断开 手动断开，或者连接过程中，自动断开，或回调此方法。
      void pairDisconnectError(java.lang.String sn, int errorCode, int status)
      zh: 配对连接断开错误原因回调 配对连接中异常和错误断开回调此方法。
      void pairServicesDiscovered(java.lang.String sn, boolean success)
      zh: 配对服务检测结束 在设备连接成功后，会进行相关服务进行检测，服务检测成功后，进入会秘钥配对流程 en: Matching service detection In the device after a successful connection, will carry out the relevant service testing, service test is successful, will enter the key matching process

    • 方法详细资料

      • pairConnectStart

        void pairConnectStart(java.lang.String sn)
        zh:

        配对连接开始

        开始连接设备

        en:

        Pairing connection

        Start connecting device

        参数:
        sn - 设备sn device serial number

      • pairConnectOver

        void pairConnectOver(java.lang.String sn,
                     int errorCode,
                     int status)
        zh:

        配对连接结束

        在连接过程出现异常或错误断开

        en:

        End of pairing connection

        An exception or error occurs during the connection.

        参数:
        sn - 设备对象 device serial number
        errorCode - 错误代码 connect errorCode, com.slightech.bluetooth.le.LeDeviceConnector#ERROR_*
        status - 状态码 connect gatt status，android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_* Possible errorCode values are: LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_ADDRESS_INVALID LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_CONNECT_FAILED LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_DISCOVER_FAILED LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_DISCONNECT_FAILED Possible status values are: android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INSUFFICIENT_AUTHENTICATION android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_REQUEST_NOT_SUPPORTED android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INSUFFICIENT_ENCRYPTION android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INVALID_OFFSET android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INVALID_ATTRIBUTE_LENGTH android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_CONNECTION_CONGESTED android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_FAILURE
        另请参阅:
        BluetoothLeAgent.BluetoothLeCallback.bleConnectFailed(BluetoothDevice, int, int), LeDeviceConnector.LeConnectCallback.onLeConnectionError(int, int)

      • pairServicesDiscovered

        void pairServicesDiscovered(java.lang.String sn,
                            boolean success)
        zh:

        配对服务检测结束

        在设备连接成功后，会进行相关服务进行检测，服务检测成功后，进入会秘钥配对流程

        en:

        Matching service detection

        In the device after a successful connection, will carry out the relevant service testing, service test is successful, will enter the key matching process

        参数:
        sn - 设备sn Device serial number
        success - true 服务检测成功 Service detection success false 服务检测失败 Service detection failure

      • pairBindStart

        void pairBindStart(java.lang.String sn)
        zh:

        配对绑定开始

        连接成功、服务检测成功后，进入配对秘钥开始，需要在次方法中调用reqeustPassword请求小觅秘钥。 如果已存储设备配对秘钥，则直接调用sendPassword 发送秘钥进行配对。

        en:

        Pairing binding start

        After the connection is successful, the service detection into paired secret key start, needed in the method call reqeustPassword request Xiaomi secret key. If the storage device pairing secret key, directly call sendPassword to send the secret key pair.

        参数:
        sn - 设备sn Device serial number

      • pairBindOver

        void pairBindOver(java.lang.String sn,
                  boolean passwordRight)
        zh:

        配对绑定结束

        秘钥配对结束，秘钥正确配对成功，秘钥错误则配对失败。

        en:

        Pairing binding end

        The secret key pair end key, correct pairing is successful, the secret key error pairing failed.

        参数:
        sn - 设备sn Device serial number
        passwordRight - true 配对秘钥正确 The correct key pair false 配对秘钥错误 Pairing key error

      • pairDisconnect

        void pairDisconnect(java.lang.String sn)
        zh:

        配对连接断开

        手动断开，或者连接过程中，自动断开，或回调此方法。

        en:

        Pair disconnect

        Disconnect, or automatically disconnect, or back to this method.

        参数:
        sn - 设备sn Device serial number

      • pairDisconnectError

        void pairDisconnectError(java.lang.String sn,
                         int errorCode,
                         int status)
        zh:

        配对连接断开错误原因回调

        配对连接中异常和错误断开回调此方法。

        en:

        The pairing connection is disconnected from the cause of the error.

        This method for the exception and error in the pairing connection.

        参数:
        sn - 设备sn device serial number Possible errorCode values are: LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_ADDRESS_INVALID LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_CONNECT_FAILED LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_DISCOVER_FAILED LeDeviceConnector.ERROR_DISCONNECT_FAILED Possible status values are: android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INSUFFICIENT_AUTHENTICATION android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_REQUEST_NOT_SUPPORTED android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INSUFFICIENT_ENCRYPTION android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INVALID_OFFSET android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_INVALID_ATTRIBUTE_LENGTH android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_CONNECTION_CONGESTED android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt#GATT_FAILURE
